DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 study pemetrexed gemcitabine chemotherapy give every 14 day patient advanced stage non-small cell lung cancer . This treatment patient receive prior chemotherapy treatment lung cancer . The primary goal find tumor get small disappears treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Pemetrexed Gemcitabine Patients With Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have diagnosis advance stage nonsmall cell lung cancer . 2 . Are able active home and/or work . 3 . Have receive chemotherapy cancer disease . 4 . Have good organ function ( example , blood work normal ) . 5 . Have complete prior radiation treatment least 4 week ago . 1 . Have treat investigational/research drug within last month . 2 . Have cancer spread brain causing symptom . 3 . Have active infection serious medical condition . 4 . Have second cancer addition nonsmall cell lung cancer . 5 . Can stop take aspirin antiinflammatory agent 58 day .
